juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required concrete visual elements for the final image:

*   Facial features of the person from image 1
*   Body shape of the person from image 1
*   Long braided hairstyle of the person from image 1
*   Pose of the person from image 1 (standing, looking over shoulder)
*   Beige ribbed short-sleeve upper garment (from image 2)
*   Floral print inner layer of the upper garment, visible at neckline and hem (from image 2)
*   Three-button placket on the upper garment (from image 2)
*   Black flared lower garment/pants (from image 3)
*   White graphic prints (cats, fishbones, stars) on the lower garment/pants (from image 3)
*   Black platform shoes (as shown with the lower garment in image 3)
*   Foggy park background (from image 1)
*   Pink blossoming tree branches overhead in the background (from image 1)
*   Green grassy ground with fallen pink petals in the background (from image 1)
